info.title: Close a modal dialog in reading mode

setupScript.name: openAddDeliveryAddressDialogAndFocusFirstInput
setupScript.description: opens the 'Add Delivery Address' modal dialog, and sets focus on the first input

user: With the reading cursor on an input inside a modal dialog, close the dialog.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on an input inside a modal dialog, close the dialog.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Role of the focused element ('button') is conveyed
Name of the focused element ('Add Delivery Address') is conveyed
